AccountFactory
service in module Accounts

Description

Singleton used to manage accounts in the system

Methods

  • addAccount()

    Creates a new account object in the account array

  • deleteAccount(account)

    Removes the specified account from the account array

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    accountObject
    • The account object to be deleted

Properties

  • accounts

    Creates a new account object in the account array
